features: A lightweight Hyaluronic Acid facial serum elixir that melts into skin. The serum for face formula acts quickly to brighten skin tone, firm & plump the skin, while reducing signs of wrinkles. Instantly freshens skin for a well-rested appearance.
For all skin types. Botanical hyaluronic acid gives you the ultimate boost in moisturizing power and tones the skin, while Vitamin C reverses trace signs of aging.
Key natural & organic ingredients include Hyaluronic Acid, Green Tea, Vitamin E, and Vitamin C. Cruelty free. Fragrance free. Made in USA with globally sourced ingredients.

We're all about providing truth and clarity in natural, effective skincare. In a crowded market with over-hyped “miracle ingredients”, we found most ingredients don't produce results. We drilled down to 8 key ingredients that generated the majority of the benefits for your skin: Our "Eight Saints".
Worry Free Return Policy: Try Eight Saints hyaluronic face serum worry free with our 30 day return policy. If a product doesn't work for you, contact us and we'll happily refund you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pep Rally Face Serum Seeking C Face Serum High Society Face Oil Skin Type All All All Key Benefit Anti-Aging Anti-Aging Hydration Key Ingredients Green Tea, MSM, Hyaluronic Acid, & Vitamin C Vitamin C, Dandelion, Jojoba, & Vitamin E Vitamin E, Marula Oil, Jojoba Oil, & Grapeseed Oil Scent Aloe Citrus Neroli, Honey, & Citrus When to Use Morning or Evening Morning or Evening Morning or Evening Item Form Serum Serum Oil Retail 36.00 38.00 46.00 Size 1 Ounce 1 Ounce 1 Ounce

Step 1: Down to Earth Gel Face Wash Step 2: Coast is Clear Face Toner Step 3: Pep Rally Face Serum Step 4: All In Eye Cream Step 5: Chase the Sun SPF 30 Face Moisturizer How to Use Use 1-2 pumps of gel face cleanser. Add water to lather. Gently massage onto your face in an upward, circular motion. Splash with warm water to rinse. For optimal results use each morning and evening. Saturate a cotton pad and sweep over face, neck and under eyes. Alternatively, spritz 3 pumps onto palms and gently pat face for a midday refresh. After cleansing, smooth a few drops of this anti aging serum to face and neck until absorbed. Follow with moisturizer. Works well under makeup. Lightly dab the anti-aging eye cream under and around the eye area without pulling the skin until it has fully absorbed. Dispense a small amount into the palm of hand. Use fingertips to apply to face and neck. Retail 22.00 18.00 36.00 36.00 34.00 Key Benefits Cleansing Toning Anti-Aging Anti-Aging Hydration/Sun Protection Key Ingredients Vitamin C, Kaolin Clay, French Clay, & DMAE Vitamin B5, Witch Hazel, Seawater, & Kelp Green Tea, MSM, Hyaluronic Acid, & Vitamin C Squalane, MSM, Cocoa Butter, & Cucumber Hydrosol Zinc, Vitamin E, Hyaluronic Acid, & Squalane When to Use Morning and Evening Morning and Evening Morning or Evening Morning and Evening Morning Size 2 Ounces 6 Ounces 1 Ounce 0.5 Ounce 2 Ounces

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This serum is legit!
reviews.reviewText: Pep Rally Gel Radiance Serum does what it promises! My skin truly does look more radiant! Another thing I absolutely love about this serum is my skin is so much softer and the elasticity has improved! I think it’s because this product really helps my skin retain moisture. I put it on every night after I wash my face when my face is still a little damp. It’s a lightweight thin gel that’s really easy to apply and you only need a little bit. It absorbs very quickly. I follow that up with an eye cream and a moisturizer. I use Eight Saints All In eye cream and Eight Saints Up The Anti night cream. I love Eight Saints products because they use natural and organic ingredients, they don’t test on animals and they actually WORK! I feel like these 3 are the perfect combination for waking up with soft and healthy looking skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Radiant, hydrated skin
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Eight Saints skincare products for almost a year now and the Pep Rally Gel Radiance Serum is one product that I do not go a day without. It is so lightweight and has such a subtle hint of pleasing fragrance that lends a spa like quality to my morning skincare routine. The hyaluronic acid hydrates my skin, and the vitamin C and green tea give my skin a sun-kissed radiant glow! This serum also makes my pores appear invisible. I usually follow this with the Eight Saints Chase the Sun SPF moisturizer, which also is amazing. My skin looks flawless, and I rarely wear foundation or blush any longer because my skin looks so plump, radiant, and healthy--a veritable "pep rally" for your face! Clean, simple, and super effective ingredients!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching for a product that makes my skin feel amazing. I finally found it! Pep Rally is a light weight, fast absorbing, lightly scented serum that delivers as promised. I have been using this serum twice a day for 12 days and can feel and see a difference. My skin is hydrated and my fine lines are disappearing. It has a very light and pleasant scent and absorbs quickly. This serum is now part of my daily routine. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional texture, impressive results for afford price
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t expecting to be impressed with this serum given the modest price but I’m delightfully surprised! This Eight Saints serum is incredibly moisturizing and adds firmness to my skin instantly. It’s a true serum, so you still need to use a moisturizer. I pair this with Renew Me from FRE and they work well together to give my skin a clean, matte/non-greasy, firm texture. It absorbs instantly into the skin leaving no residue or stickiness. I haven’t used it long enough to know whether it reduces dark spots, but on its texture and early results alone I’m sold!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So smooth and refreshing
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Neutrogena hydro boost serum for a few years. I have extremely sensitive skin and every product I have tried causes eczema on my face. I'm so obsessed with these products because they do not hurt my sensitive skin and they work really well. This stuff is cooling and refreshing when you put it in. It has a light scent and absorbs quickly into your skin. My skin feels smoother and I'm noticing some reduction in my wrinkles on my forehead. Definitely will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A new edition to my routine
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for a little over a week and I have noticed how soft my face feels. I use this product after I cleanse and tone in the morning. It absorbs well and my skin feels hydrated and healthier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, awesome product!
reviews.reviewText: Recently, I visited a local salon for a facial. It was a wonderful experience. My skin felt and looked amazing. The esthetician gave me a list of the products that she used on my skin. The total cost of those products (in the salon) was well over $500. Instead of purchasing the products, I decided to research products with the same ingredients to see if I could find more reasonably priced alternatives.Happily, I found Eight Saints. The ingredients in the Pep Rally Face Serum were so close to the pricey serum that the esthetician used on my face. I used the Pep Rally Face Serum after using Eight Saint’s Coast Is Clear Face Toner. I found the serum so lightweight and effective. My skin quickly soaked it up. Just a little was enough. It felt very moisturizing and so refreshing. My skin felt good and looked brighter. I also felt like the product was an excellent value for the price. It was so much less expensive that the serum the esthetician recommended and I liked the feel of it even better.I look forward to trying out other Eight Saints products. Love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous daily plumping serum!
reviews.reviewText: I love many of the Eight Saints products but the Pep Rally serum was a surprise to me on the performance. The texture, weight and clean fragrance of the serum makes it a joy to smooth over face. I have mature combination skin and it plumps the skin filling in fine lines and therefore makes a great primer before makeup, also on days with no makeup. It provides enough moisture that lasts, however the way it smooths the texture of the skin is incomparable to any other product I’ve tried.The ingredients list is pure and natural with some excellent potent ingredients. This is one favorite facial product I can’t live without!It’s not meant to be a deeper nighttime moisturizer, it’s meant for lighter daytime wear - for that it’s excellent.
